question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' at the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.

question: How can I update my email address?
answer: Go to Settings > Profile and update your email address.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: Please contact our support team via the Help Center to permanently delete your account.

question: Can I change my username?
answer: Usernames cannot be changed once created, but you can create a new account.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact customer support via the 'Help' section in the app or email us at support@example.com.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes, all data is encrypted and securely stored following industry standards.

question: Can I use the app offline?
answer: Some features are available offline, but you will need an internet connection for syncing and updates.

question: How do I enable dark mode?
answer: Go to Settings > Display > Dark Mode to enable or disable dark mode.

question: Where can I download the mobile app?
answer: You can download our app from the App Store (iOS) or Google Play Store (Android).

question: How do I update the app?
answer: Visit the App Store or Google Play Store, and check for updates on the app page.

question: Why am I not receiving notification emails?
answer: Check your spam folder and make sure notifications are enabled in your account settings.

question: How do I change my subscription plan?
answer: Go to Settings > Billing to change, upgrade, or cancel your subscription plan.

question: What payment methods are supported?
answer: We support credit/debit cards, PayPal, and UPI payments.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: Yes, students can apply for a 20% discount by verifying their student ID.

question: How do I download my invoices?
answer: Invoices are available in Settings > Billing > Invoices section.

question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
answer: You will retain access until the end of the billing cycle, after which premium features will stop.

question: How do I recover a deleted file?
answer: Deleted files can be restored from the Trash folder within 30 days.

question: How can I share my files with others?
answer: Open the file, click on 'Share', and copy the link or add email addresses to share directly.

question: Can I use my account on multiple devices?
answer: Yes, you can log in on multiple devices using the same account credentials.

question: How do I log out of all devices?
answer: Go to Settings > Security and click 'Log out of all devices'.

question: Do you have a free trial?
answer: Yes, new users get a 7-day free trial of premium features.

question: Can I export my data?
answer: Yes, you can export your data in JSON or CSV format from Settings > Data Export.

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: Go to Help > Report a Bug and provide details about the issue.

question: Is two-factor authentication available?
answer: Yes, you can enable 2FA from Settings > Security for extra account protection.

question: What browsers are supported?
answer: We support the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
